meanings.sent1: She was ingoing the house to find her lost keys.
meanings.sent2: The cat was ingoing through the open window.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was ingoing the bird feeder for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The river was ingoing into the cave, creating a mysterious underground flow.
meanings.sent5: The detective's ingoing investigation led to the discovery of the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: The act of entering or going in
meanings.sent1: The ingoing of the students into the classroom was noisy.
meanings.sent2: The ingoing of the fresh air through the open window was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The ingoing of the clown into the circus ring brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The ingoing of the sunlight through the clouds brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ingoing of the water into the dam caused a rise in the water level.
